title: Ticket #5215: condor_config_val -set doesn't take effect until after restart
description:
condor_config_val -rset takes effect immediately, but condor_config_val -set doesn't: 

  manta(41)% condor_master
  manta(42)% condor_config_val -schedd VM_RECHECK_INTERVAL
  600
  manta(43)% condor_config_val -schedd -rset "VM_RECHECK_INTERVAL = 510"
  Successfully set configuration "VM_RECHECK_INTERVAL = 510" on schedd wenger@manta.cs.wisc.edu <128.105.14.228:55723?addrs=128.105.14.228-55723>.
  manta(44)% condor_reconfig -schedd
  Sent "Reconfig" command to local schedd
  manta(45)% condor_config_val -schedd VM_RECHECK_INTERVAL
  510
  manta(46)% condor_config_val -schedd -set "VM_RECHECK_INTERVAL = 550"
  Successfully set configuration "VM_RECHECK_INTERVAL = 550" on schedd wenger@manta.cs.wisc.edu <128.105.14.228:55723?addrs=128.105.14.228-55723>.
  manta(47)% condor_reconfig -schedd
  Sent "Reconfig" command to local schedd
  manta(48)% condor_config_val -schedd VM_RECHECK_INTERVAL
  510
  manta(49)% condor_off -master
  Sent "Kill-Daemon" command for "master" to local master
  manta(50)% condor_master
  manta(51)% condor_config_val -schedd VM_RECHECK_INTERVAL
  550

Note: I also tried this with the startd instead of the schedd, and the same thing happened.

The user on RUST didn't report this exact problem, but I found it when messing around with things to respond to them...
remarks:
2015-Aug-12 10:10:19 by wenger:
Oh, yeah -- I originally found this on 8.3.8, also reproduced it on the head of the 8.2 branch (8.2.10), so I'm assuming it's in 8.2.8. (The RUST user has 8.3.5.)

2015-Aug-13 11:18:57 by johnkn:
Code is actually working the way it's supposed to. The problem is that -rset takes precedence over -set which is why the value that was set is only visible after a restart. Will change the doc to reflect this, and also the success message from the tool to remind that changes require a reconfig before they take effect.
check_ins: 2015-Aug-24 15:15   Check-in [45657]: add to condor_config_val doc a line that indicates -rset wins over -set. #5215 this commit also changes the output message from condor_config_val -set and -rset to indicate that the change will not take effect until reconfig. ===VersionHistory:None=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
